glossdef.p: Land which has been designated under a power of legislation as being subject, or likely to be subject, to bushfires.

glossdef.title: NSW REPLACE Definition

ol.li: has been designated under legislation; or
has been identified under an environmental planning instrument, development control plan or in the course of processing and determining a development application,

glossdef.p: as land that can support a bushfire or is likely to be subject to bushfire attack.
